|brand = Alpha Networks |model = WMC-AC01 |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 02/18/2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Alpha_Networks_WMC-AC01 |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = AC1300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = Mini PCIe |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = (oversized)

|chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4360; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = U.FL |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 3 |rxchains = 3 |sstreams = 3 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |802.11ac = 1300 |802.11n = 450 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Per the FCC datasheet, the device is using... ([https://fccid.io/images/device/RRK/2012060056-1/Users-Manual-0C15763B.jpg FCC image]) *three [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product.aspx?ProductID=969 '''Skyworks''' ( / '''SiGe''') SE5003L 5GHz Power Amplifier ICs] *three [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product.aspx?ProductID=711 '''Skyworks''' SKY13351-378LF GaAs SPDT Switches] *three [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product.aspx?ProductID=676 '''Skyworks''' SKY65404-31 5GHz LNA ICs]
.. and per the datasheet, it has the following specs...
'''802.11a''' *'''Transmitter Output Power''' (typical @ room temp [25°C], tolerance ±2dB) **5180~5240MHz - 8dBm *'''EIRP''' **17.5dBm @ CH 36~64 **29.5dBm @ CH 149~165 *'''Receiver Sensitivity''' (Error Rate = 10% at room temperature) **-82dBm @ 6Mbps **-81dBm @ 9Mbps **-79dBm @ 12Mbps **-77dBm @ 18Mbps **-74dBm @ 24Mbps **-70dBm @ 36Mbps **-66dBm @ 48Mbps **-65dBm @ 54Mbps
